text: â€œAnthu onse adali a chipembedzo chimodzi (cha Chisilamu panthawi ya Adam kufikira Nuh kenako adayamba kupatukana), ndipo Allah adatumiza aneneri onena nkhani zabwino ndi ochenjeza; ndipo pamodzi nawo adavumbulutsa mabuku achoonadi kuti aweruzire pakati pa anthu pa zimene adasemphana. Ndipo sadasemphane pa zimenezo koma aja amene adapatsidwa mabukuwo pambuyo powadzera zizindikiro zoonekera poyera, chifukwa chakuchitirana dumbo pakati pawo. Koma Allah adawaongolera amene adakhulupirira kuchoonadi cha zomwe adasempaniranazo, mwachifuniro chake. Ndipo Allah amamutsogolera ku njira yolunjika amene wamfuna
